column4: I'm using ubuntu 8.10 and I'm trying to create a USB startup disk.  I'm using a 8GB flash drive.   The program just hangs
I'm using ubuntu 8.10 and I'm trying to create a USB startup disk.  I'm using a 8GB flash drive.   The program just hangs at starting up!
best to just ask the channel your question.  If someone knows the answer, they will try to answer you
